column1: Local Foods////The crispness of the fresh shrimp and the slight citrusy tang of the sauce
column2: it's like you're eating a lobster roll. Take THAT
column3: east coast! And there's no skimping on the good stuff. No. Not at Local. Every bite is chock full of meaty crab and juicy shrimp. I do love a sandwich that's evenly distributed. (and yes
column4: I do typically open up my sandwiches and re-arrange ingredients.)
